name: TUView
summary: TUView lets you instantiate a UIView with an array of image assest that serve as a tutorial for your app.
description: When you download a new app there is usually a quick intro page that shows you a pagnated set of images that describe basic set up instructions and/or functionality of the app. This pod lets you duplicate that anywhere in your app! You instantiate the TUView and pass it an array of image assets. You can then present and dismiss it on any view in your app.
